name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a deep understanding of **Cloud** services, including **IaaS**, **PaaS**, and **AIaaS**. Proficient in leveraging **VMware**, **OpenStack**, and **GPU** technologies, I excel at building and optimizing high-performance cloud solutions tailored for both the healthcare and financial sectors. My extensive background in **Networking** complements my abilities to design and implement secure infrastructures that meet rigorous compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

In addition to my cloud expertise, I have a strong foundation in full-stack development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities, enhancing functionalities through predictive analytics and intelligent automation.

My commitment to best practices in CI/CD automation and microservices architecture ensures robust and scalable applications. I also possess notable experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Adept at communication and presentation, I effectively bridge technical concepts and stakeholder requirements.

Implemented enterprise-level DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, improving deployment frequency by 30% while integrating security scans and linting into development workflows.
Optimized machine learning model deployment with **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow**, enhancing model training and validation durations by 40% across production environments.

Optimized deployment workflows by implementing feature flags and blue-green deployments using leading orchestrators, allowing for a **30%** reduction in rollback incidents during major updates.

Collaborated on interdepartmental projects combining e-commerce solutions with the cloud to enhance business productivity by implementing automated workflows and improving legacy systems.
